description: Type/unit: unified node model supports props + children and a rootId with a deterministic tree traversal.
Unit: setNodeProp updates deep paths (dot-notation) immutably and does not mutate previous state references.
Unit: unsetNodeProp removes deep paths and cleans up empty objects where required by conventions.
Unit: insertChild inserts at index and preserves existing child order deterministically.
Unit: moveNode reorders within same parent and re-parents across parents while preventing cycles.
Unit: deleteNode removes subtree and removes the node id from its parent's children list.
Unit: undo/redo returns to exact prior tree states after a sequence of patch operations (including move + delete).
Unit: component schema declares defaults, editable props, and allowed parent/child relationships for each component type.
Repo/unit: state/hierarchy.ts is removed and all hierarchy checks resolve via schema rules only.
Integration: adding a node from the palette uses schema defaults for props and attaches to a valid container.
Integration: outline view renders the correct tree order (children arrays) and selection highlights the correct node.
Integration: breadcrumbs compute the ancestor path from children-only hierarchy without persisted parentId.
Integration: canvas rendering reads layout/style props from unified node props and produces expected DOM styles.
E2E/integration: drag-drop reorder within a flex container updates children order via moveNode.
E2E/integration: drag-drop move across containers updates the unified tree only (no legacy fields) and respects schema nesting rules.
Integration: resizing a supported node writes sizing props via setNodeProp (style.width/style.height or flexBasis) and the DOM updates.
Integration: Inspector renders controls for a selected node from schema and updates the tree via generic patch operations.
Unit: Inspector normalizers convert input strings into canonical forms (for example css-length normalization) before writing props.
Integration: table columns editor updates metadata.columns via schema widget and updates are reflected in preview/canvas representation.
Integration: workspace export -> import roundtrips unified node props deterministically and template AST output remains stable.
Unit: serialized workspace snapshot contains only the unified tree format + UI settings and omits legacy per-node typed fields.
Repo: no references remain to removed per-property store actions and legacy typed node fields after refactor.
